Constructor Detail

Point

public explicit Point( int x_coord = 0, int y_coord = 0, short plane = 0 );
Parameters:
x_coord - the x coordinate
y_coord - the y coordinate
plane - the z coordinate, also the plane in the runescape environment.

Method Detail

GetAngle

public double GetAngle();

GetDistance

public double GetDistance( Point other );
Parameters:
other - the other Point Note that this is the same as computing the difference between this and the other Point and then taking the Radius of the resulting Point.
Returns:
the distance between this Point and the given Point

the z coordinate of this Point
